title: 小白求助-必备mod装了个遍，还是进不去
author: utuuua
txt_content:
本人新手中的新手{:10_503:}为了玩工业2搞了一下午{:10_493:}还是进不去，显示错误如下：
   Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to E:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-09-23_19.11.28-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 2143ca6e --------
Generated 12-9-23 下午7:11
- Minecraft Version: 1.3.2
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 141408800 bytes (134 MB) / 246210560 bytes (234 MB) up to 259522560 bytes (247 MB)
- JVM Flags: 0 total; 
- FML: FML v3.0.196.366 Minecraft Forge 4.1.1.251 4 mods loaded, 4 mods active
 FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 mod_ModLoaderMp [mod_ModLoaderMp] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 IC2 [IndustrialCraft 2] (industrialcraft-2_1.106.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
- LWJGL: 2.8.4
- OpenGL: GeForce G100/PCI/SSE2/3DNOW! GL version 2.1.2, NVIDIA Corporation
- Is Modded: Definitely; 'forge,fml'
- Type: Client
- Texture Pack: Default
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
- World MpServer Entities: 1 total; [atg['Joe'/330, l='MpServer', x=8.50, y=66.62, z=8.50]]
- World MpServer Players: 1 total; [atg['Joe'/330, l='MpServer', x=8.50, y=66.62, z=8.50]]
- World MpServer Chunk Stats: MultiplayerChunkCache: 0
- Forced Entities: 1 total; [atg['Joe'/330, l='MpServer', x=8.50, y=66.62, z=8.50]]
- Retry Entities: 0 total; []
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: ModLoader.clientConnect(Lasv;Lcs;)V
 at asv.a(NetClientHandler.java:160)
 at cs.a(Packet1Login.java:112)
 at ba.b(MemoryConnection.java:75)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.l(Minecraft.java:1797)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.J(Minecraft.java:834)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:764)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT c314d52a ----------

跪求各路大神解决一下{:10_512:}感激不尽

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content: 奇怪我看不到有啥错误……你除了装了forge和IC2还有装什么吗？

replies.author: utuuua
replies.txt_content:
我都装了industrialcraft-2_1.106；minecraftforge-universal-4.1.1.251；ModLoaderMP 1.3.2 v1；GuiAPI-0.14.6-1.3.2；MC 1.3.2 - Player API client 1.2；MC 1.3.2 - Render Player API 1.2；ml+am1.3.2；CraftBukkit 1.3.1-R2.0 - Player API bukkit 1.0
总之本吧有一个专门的帖子里面全是必装mod{:10_524:}我就全装了{:10_499:}

replies.author: utuuua
replies.txt_content:
sylqiuyifeng 发表于 2012-9-23 20:41 
奇怪我看不到有啥错误……你除了装了forge和IC2还有装什么吗？
我都装了industrialcraft-2_1.106；minecraftforge-universal-4.1.1.251；ModLoaderMP 1.3.2 v1；GuiAPI-0.14.6-1.3.2；MC 1.3.2 - Player API client 1.2；MC 1.3.2 - Render Player API 1.2；ml+am1.3.2；CraftBukkit 1.3.1-R2.0 - Player API bukkit 1.0
总之本吧有一个专门的帖子里面全是必装mod我就全装了

replies.author: utuuua
utuuua
replies.txt_content: 我在很多地方看见要装modloader，为什么不用装？
